snippet: The blasts in the Khyber tribal region occurred at a bus stand and a nearby bakery in the town of Landi Kotal.
abstract: Two bombings kill at least 32 people in the Khyber tribal region of Pakistan; no militant group claims responsibility for the bombings, but local officials suspect involvement by the outlawed militant group, Lashkar-i-Islam.
lead_paragraph: The blasts in the Khyber tribal region occurred at a bus stand and a nearby bakery in the town of Landi Kotal.

headline.seo: Car Bombing in Pakistan Kills 24 People
headline.main: Bombs in Pakistan Kill at Least 32
headline.print_headline: Bombs in Pakistan Kill at Least 32
